title.rendered: Kitchen and Bath Design News features Outdoor Signature Kitchens and Eldorado Natural Stone

content.rendered:
Kitchen and Bath Design News features Eldorado Stone’s Outdoor Signature Kitchens and the Eldorado Natural Stone Collection in the January 2016 issue. The article, “The Great Outdoors” features the Sierra Signature Kitchen along with CutLedge Grey Fox from Eldorado Natural Stone. The editor writes about the rising popularity of outdoor kitchens, and quotes Ramsay Hawfield, Vice President of Marketing and Product Development. The article can be found on pages 80-101.

Find more details about Signature Kitchens here. Learn more about Eldorado Natural Stone and CutLedge Grey Fox here.
